subject: Re: allparks.com.au
preview: Hi Nic,  Just confirming we are done updating the images on the staging site  https://allparks.wolfiq.cloud/

full_threads.body:
Hi Nic,

Just confirming we are done updating the images on the staging site

https://allparks.wolfiq.cloud/

done updating the images on the staging site
@cindy

https://allparks.wolfiq.cloud/
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Thanks - I'm in!

Just checking on images.. front main one was pixelated... I updated - however when uploading the imagify compression seems to change the colours and make them images weirdly bright.. might also be happening with the main logo? Attached logo to use in svg and original images (very quick export trace so will update this later once more final).

Look forward to seeing the final. Thanks guys.



Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group

Hi Nichole,

I’ve just added the password, so you should be able to access it now.
nichole@envest.com.au
gkzQHuJ&tiogGec87ZTHNOHc

We’ll be sending through the updates shortly.

Hi Rica

No luck or email received. See below when also trying myself… Either way, let me know when the majority of updates to finalise are done today and I'll jump in later when I can get access.



Nichole Valk

Hi Nichole,

I’ve checked the WordPress admin dashboard, and it looks like your email address is already set up as an admin user. I’ve gone ahead and sent a password reset link to your email.

Please let me know if you need any further assistance!

Hi Nic,

Of course - Support@ will get this sent across shortly.

Thanks,
Andy
All set - project added to ClickUp projects by @ricaR

Thanks Nichole. We're on it.

Andy will be in touch with next steps and confirm a turn around time tomorrow.

Thanks,
Heath

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Tier 3** workflow

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath & team


Allparks is ready to be created asap next please.


Can you please setup the new build staging site based on all existing from allparks.com.au to get a start, as our most urgent build next asap.. I'm trying to get hold of their logo file (quality one) and the illustrations as they want to keep this child-like caravan park 'style' - use what you can for now.




Let me know what else you need from me - and a rough turnaround time if possible, please.
Many thanks
Nichole

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group
